MERAKI_API_KEY.description: The API token from the Meraki Dashboard.

CACHE_CRON_JOB_STRING.description: The cron string for controlling often should the cache be refreshed.

CANCEL_DETECTION_TYPE.description: The cancel detection type for handling cancelling slot-filling when being prompted to enter an org/network. Cna be FUZZY or NEURAL_NET.

GOOGLE_SUPPORT.description: Enable Actions on Google platform integration support.
